summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the municipal water system of the City; providing for the defeasance of the claim or lien of the City's outstanding Second Lien Water Revenue Bonds, 1983; authorizing the transfer of money and investments and investing or reinvesting the same to accomplish the defeasance; authorizing the execution of an agreement with Puget Sound National Bank of Tacoma, Washington, as Defeasance Trustee; and authorizing the call for redemption prior to their maturities of those 1983 bonds.
